None.Name: Withering Spear
None.Description: Every 2.5 seconds , unit throws a poison-tipped spear dealing 85 damage and slowing enemy units.Slowed enemy unit may only move at walkspeed.Last for 10 seconds

None.Name: Amii Ashfighter
None.Description: Enable to gain Slam , Swift but lose range attack.

None.Name: Slam
None.Description: Attacked units cannot use their abilities and ranged attack for 10 seconds.
